text.tspan: -- The definition of the enumeration and the synchronizer type --
-- for the thread type in the Task_Features package --
type TType_Event_Type_Queue_Type is array (0 .. 8) of TType_Event_Type;
type Evt2_Queue_Type is array (0 .. 2) of Data_Defs.Int_Type;
type Evt3_Queue_Type is array (0 .. 2) of Data_Defs.Int_Type;
-- Instantiation of the the synchronizer in Local_Comm package --
-- Dispatcher for the thread subcomponent in Dispatchers package --
